ExtDataShare.name: ExtDataShare
ExtDataShare.description: Represents a data share, which is a collection of Data Cloud objects that can be shared with other Data Cloud orgs or third-party partners.

DataShareType.description: The type of data share, indicating the direction of data flow. If Outbound, the data share was created on this Data Cloud org and is shared to third-party partners or with another Data Cloud org. If Inbound, the data share comes from another Data Cloud org and is shared to this Data Cloud org.

DataSpaceId.description: The ID of the data space under which the data share was created.

InboundDataShareName.description: The name of the data share in the source Data Cloud org.

InboundDataShareOrgIdentifier.description: The ID of the source Data Cloud org that shared a data share with the target org.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the data share.

ObjectCount.description: The number of Data Cloud objects added to this data share.
